person.persName: John J. McDevitt (Louisville, Jefferson County, minister)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, minister and principal. Native of England. Married to Elizabeth McDevitt. Father of Mary McDevitt and Sarah McDevitt. Minister of First Presbyterian Church in Louisville in 1860. Principal of the Louisville Industrial School in 1860.
